title: $t(faq:heading): How does Auction Template work?
desc: Frequently asked questions regarding Auction Template, pricing, features, contact and support.
heading: FAQ

1.a: Auction Template allows anybody to create an attractive product description for their existing eBay listings. In contrast to many other available solutions online, our editor is fully automated and requires no manual entries, since we get the data directly from official eBay sources. Auction Template is completely free and easy to use.
